D

database - package database
 
Database - Class in database
This Database Class is the main Class in HarambeDB, it stores tables and organizes the structure of the database directory.

H

HarambeColumnList - Class in database.table.column
Main implementation of interface ColumnList for HarambeDB database.
HarambeColumnList() - Constructor for class database.table.column.HarambeColumnList
 
HarambePartition<PrimaryKey extends java.lang.Comparable<? super PrimaryKey>> - Class in database.table
The main Partition implementation in HarambeDB, it stores a dictionary of primary keys mapping to rows.
HarambePartition(String, int) - Constructor for class database.table.HarambePartition
Creates a new partition inside a table directory and with an ID, if the ID already exists the other table will be overwritten.
HarambeRow - Class in database.table.row
Main implementation of interface Row for HarambeDB database.
HarambeRow(ColumnList) - Constructor for class database.table.row.HarambeRow
Creates a new row with the ColumnList specified
HarambException - Exception in database
This is a special exeption that is thrown when something related to HarambeDB goes wrong.

T

Table<PrimaryKey extends java.lang.Comparable<? super PrimaryKey>> - Class in database.table
This Table Class, along with Partition are the Backbone of HarambeDB, it creates a directory inside the project where the table and partition files are stored, with extensions .hbtb and .hbpt respectibly, each partition has an auto-increment ID to identify the partition uniquely.
Table(String, String, Class<?>, String) - Constructor for class database.table.Table
Creates a new table within the specified database directory
tableMap - Variable in class database.Database
A dictionary that maps the name of the database to an index in the tables array

tables - Variable in class database.Database
An array of tables in the database
